destination.description: the 33 byte, hex-encoded, node ID of the node that the payment should go to

amount_msat.description: a whole number, or a whole number with suffix `msat` or `sat`, or a three decimal point number with suffix `sat`, or an 1 to 11 decimal point  number suffixed by `btc`

label.description: used to attach a label to payments, and is returned in lightning-listpays(7) and lightning-listsendpays(7)

maxfeepercent.description: limits the money paid in fees as percentage of the total amount that is to be transferred, and defaults to *0.5*

retry_for.description: until *retry_for* seconds passes, the command will keep finding routes and retrying the payment. However, a payment may be delayed for up to `maxdelay` blocks by another node; clients should be prepared for this worst case. Defaults to 60 seconds

maxdelay.description: number of blocks the payment may be delayed

exemptfee.description: used for tiny payments which would be dominated by the fee leveraged by forwarding nodes. Setting `exemptfee` allows the `maxfeepercent` check to be skipped on fees that are smaller than *exemptfee*. Defaults to 5000 millisatoshi

extratlvs.description: dictionary of additional fields to insert into the final tlv. The format is 'fieldnumber': 'hexstring'
